name: Eudia Lite
description: Record meetings, transcribe with AI, sync to Salesforce. Calendar integration, smart tagging, and sales intelligence.
author: Eudia
releaseNotes: v4.13.0: Calendar auto-stop grace period (5-min warning instead of hard cut), template-specific follow-up emails (Demo/MEDDIC/CS/General), admin dashboard at /admin, fix template auto-apply for pre-filled notes.
